name: Mark Maligalig
description: Hi! As president, my role is to lead our team in our various initiatives and events. If you’d like to learn more about this role or the group, feel free to contact me!

name: Saba Gul
description: As VP Admin, I support the team by maintaining internal communication, coordinating workshops, and am a part of many initiatives. In my downtime, I enjoy playing sudoku and listening to podcasts :)

name: Khushi Shah
description: As VP Academic my role is to facilitate the different academic support initiatives Ada’s Team offers, like Ada’s Students, and to advocate to the department on behalf of students. If there’s something you’d like me to bring up to better your experience in CS please reach out and let me know! My hobbies include listening to music and watching Modern Family!

name: MacKenzie Luong
description: As VP Communications I handle promoting our events via many platforms such as our Newsletter and Discord server and am the main contact of our email. In my free time I enjoy gaming (currently in my Terraria phase), drawing, and beadwork!

name: Bhavnoor Kaur
description: As the VP Conference - Relations, I work with our Conference Team to orchestrate and oversee UofA’s participation in conferences like Grace Hopper Celebration and CAN-CWiC. Outside school and Work, I love to paint and am also involved with multiple cultural clubs on campus.

name: Frances Igwe
description: As VP Conference - Operations, I provide support to the Conference Team in managing logistics and ensuring our attendance at major conference events is approved by the U of A. In my free time, I enjoy reading fantasy and watching TV shows.
